text: Guo Xiliang (22 September 1930 â€“ 30 December 2022) was a Chinese linguist and professor. ==Biography== Guo educated at the Hunan University, Wuhan University and Peking University. He was professor and doctoral supervisor of the at the Peking University. Guo Xiliang died in Beijing on 30 December 2022, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:Chinese academics Category:Linguists Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths
